mapper.select: select p.* from ( select RowNum rnum, r.* from ( select o.order_no,o.order_amount,o.order_date,o.payment_status,us.user_name , pro.name, o.farmer_no from tb_order o , user_tb us , PRODUCT_OPTION pro , farmer f where 1=1 and o.user_no = us.user_no and o.OPTION_NO = pro.OPTION_NO and f.farmer_no=o.farmer_no) r )p where rnum BETWEEN #{cri.rowStart} and #{cri.rowEnd}
mapper.update: update tb_order set payment_status = #{paymentStatus} where order_no = #{orderNo}
